Compute Resource Object¶

The Compute Resource Object is used to describe computational properties of the resource. Not all resources in the SGCI Resource Catalog are assumed to provide compute facilities.

type

object

properties

  • schedulerType

type

string

enum

FORK, BATCH, ON_DEMAND

  • storageResource

#/definitions/storageDefinition

  • connection

#/definitions/connectionDefinition

  • executionCommands

type

array

items

#/definitions/executionCommandDefinition

  • batchSystem

#/definitions/batchSystemDefinition

  • forkSystem

#/definitions/forkSystemDefinition

connectionDefinition¶

label assigned to identify the device as an internet point of access

type

object

properties

  • connectionProtocol

type

string

enum

SSH, GLOBUS, HTTP, SFTP, SCP, IRODS

  • securityProtocol

type

string

enum

PASSWORDS, SSHKEYS, X509, OAUTH2

  • port

type

integer

  • useProxy

type

boolean

  • proxyHost

#/definitions/hostNameDefinition

  • proxyPort

type

integer

object

properties

  • jobManager

type

string

enum

  • commandPaths

type

array

items

#/definitions/commandPathDefinition

  • partitions

type

array

items

#/definitions/partitionDefinition

string
